entries.content: Problem: Tool calls (like PowerShell search) visible during live streaming but disappear when restoring chat from history. Live streaming works, restored history rendering fails for tool content blocks.

CRITICAL DATA STRUCTURE: Saved conversation format has messages array with role + message object. Each message has: id, type (reasoning/agent_message), content, timestamp, sessionId. Reasoning messages have thinking.content field. BUT NO TOOL CALLS VISIBLE in this example - need to see what a tool call looks like when saved.
CRITICAL: Moti says I ruined the project in the last days - everything not working. Need to understand what broke and when it was last working properly.
